title: maddiehenniger/nf-imputation-pipeline params.samplesheet schema
description: Schema for the samplesheet used as input to maddiehenniger/nf-imputation-pipeline

sampleID.errorMessage: A user-provided unique sample ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

samplePath.errorMessage: A BCF/VCF(.gz) file path for samples must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.bcf' or '.vcf'/'vcf.gz'.

sampleIndex.errorMessage: The paired indexed (CSI) file path for the associated sample must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must match the sample file name with the extension '.csi'.

wgsPath.errorMessage: An optional BCF/VCF(.gz) file path containing the matching WGS sample may be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have the extension '.bcf', or '.vcf'/'vcf.gz'.

wgsIndex.errorMessage: If providing the optional WGS sample, the paired indexed (CSI) file path must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must match the WGS file name with the extension '.csi'.
